name: It's a Small World - Jam Version
name_original: It's a Small World - Jam Version
description:
It's a small world, isn't it?

Rules and Controls:

Use WASD to move your little character around. Walk to the top or bottom of the area to move to the next face of the cube. Collect all of the orbs, but do it quick! They restore themselves after 10 seconds.

Made by Jovlett for the Mix & Game Jam 2019
